comments: Energetic and on time, yelled 'Believe it!' the whole way.
Blasted music but got me there fast.
Talked non-stop about being Hokage, but solid driving.
Cool and calm ride, even gave book recommendations.
Took a detour to finish his chapter, but no complaints.
The car was full of sand but ride was chill.
Silent driver but efficient. Arrived early.
Was supposed to go to Hidden Rain Village... ended up at sea.
Kept glaring through the mirror... slightly intimidating.
